opportunities.title: Enhanced Candidate Quality Assurance
opportunities.description: Greg expressed dissatisfaction with the quality of candidates provided, indicating a need for improved candidate vetting processes in future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some of the people on the shortlist had minimal experience... after five minutes, you knew they just were nowhere near what you wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a more rigorous candidate screening process to ensure alignment with client expectations.

opportunities.title: Proactive Market Insights and Networking
opportunities.description: Greg highlighted the value of market knowledge and proactive engagement from competitors, suggesting an opportunity to expand services by offering similar insights and networking opportunities.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Hunter Healthcare offers strong market knowledge, proactive updates, and value-add connections.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a program to provide clients with regular market insights and networking opportunities to enhance perceived value.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust and Engagement
opportunities.description: The client expressed a lack of trust and engagement, indicating a need for actions to rebuild the relationship and demonstrate commitment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Client stated clearly they would not use Korn Ferry again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate a follow-up meeting to address concerns, demonstrate commitment to improvement, and explore ways to re-engage.

opportunities.title: Clarify Role Expectations and Complexity
opportunities.description: There was a lack of understanding of the matrix role, affecting candidate alignment, suggesting a need for better role clarification processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: A lack of shared clarity around the matrix COO role undermined candidate quality.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a detailed role clarification process at the start of engagements to ensure mutual understanding.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation and Offer Guidance
opportunities.description: Weak guidance on compensation and offer processes was noted, indicating a need for clearer support in these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Consultant did not demonstrate clarity or ownership in salary and benefits discussions.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide consultants with training and resources to offer clearer guidance on compensation and offer negotiations.

opportunities.title: Flexible Client-Centric Engagement
opportunities.description: The engagement dynamic felt one-sided, suggesting a need for more flexible and client-focused communication.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Engagement often depended on consultant availability rather than client need.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Adopt a more flexible approach to scheduling and communication to better align with client availability and preferences.

opportunities.title: Need for Candidates with Asian Market Experience
opportunities.description: Harry expressed a desire for candidates with more experience in the Asian market, acknowledging the challenge due to the market's youth.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have liked to see someone with a lot more Asian experience... but I also have to be fair to Korn Ferry — not necessarily a lot of those people exist, right?
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should enhance its candidate pool by focusing on identifying and developing relationships with professionals experienced in the Asian market.

opportunities.title: Address Cost Sensitivity for Small Companies
opportunities.description: Harry noted that consultancy services are perceived as costly for small companies, which affects their willingness to engage beyond recruitment services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm a small company...and they are, of course, costly, right? I mean, these guys are not cheap...I can only spend $1 once, and I don't have that many dollars, right?
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should consider offering tailored, cost-effective consultancy packages for small companies to encourage broader engagement.

opportunities.title: Leverage Trust for Broader Service Engagement
opportunities.description: Harry's trust in Korn Ferry for recruitment could be leveraged to introduce other services, provided cost concerns are addressed.
opportunities.supportingQuote: something like, you know, recruitment in that sort of level, absolutely, you know, that's where I think the dollars are very well spent.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore ways to introduce additional services to Harry by highlighting value and addressing cost concerns.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship Through Consistent Contact
opportunities.description: Harry values the long-term relationship and consistent points of contact with Korn Ferry, which reinforces trust and confidence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've been dealing with Korn Ferry literally... I mean, they've now placed me, I think, in two jobs... so I've known them for probably two, close to two decades...maybe even three decades.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain regular communication and consistent points of contact to reinforce the long-standing relationship with Harry.

opportunities.title: Potential Role of AI in Recruitment
opportunities.description: Tony noted that AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, although currently, the human touch is more valued.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Tony noted that while AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, today the value of Korn Ferry lies in its people-first approach.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore AI applications that could complement the human-centric approach in recruitment logistics and market reach.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation Benchmarking Support
opportunities.description: While compensation benchmarking is managed internally, Korn Ferry could provide valuable data points to inform Carilion's analysis.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If Korn Ferry had that information, it could help inform us as a data point, but it would not be the benchmark we would use in our final analysis.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer to provide comprehensive compensation data to support Carilion's internal benchmarking processes.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Trust and Psychological Safety
opportunities.description: The long-term relationship has built trust, enabling honest dialogue, which is crucial for continued success.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We've developed a degree of psychological safety and understanding that they can say anything, I can say anything.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to foster open communication and trust to maintain and strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Position Assessment Tools as Complementary
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's leadership assessments are valued but should be positioned as complementary to Carilion's internal tools.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think Korn Ferry's tool is good, it's helpful, and again it's just one additional data point for us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Emphasize the complementary nature of Korn Ferry's assessment tools to enhance their perceived value.

opportunities.title: Continued Role-Shaping Expertise
opportunities.description: Andre appreciated the consultant's CPA expertise in reshaping the role, suggesting a future need for similar expertise in other searches.
opportunities.supportingQuote: As Anne's a CPA... she was really additive in terms of saying, you're calling this X, this is how it looks in the market...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that consultants with relevant industry expertise are available for future searches to provide similar value.

opportunities.title: Deepen Partnership in Leadership Development
opportunities.description: OCC has an established partnership with Korn Ferry in assessments and leadership development, indicating potential for further collaboration in these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We've worked with them as a partner, primarily in our assessment and organizational development functions.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional leadership development programs or services that could benefit OCC.

opportunities.title: Re-engage with Improved Communication Practices
opportunities.description: Andre expressed willingness to rehire Korn Ferry if communication expectations are set more clearly upfront.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would rehire them, as long as we did some early setting of communication preferences, timeliness of responses, that sort of thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate a follow-up meeting to discuss and agree on communication preferences and expectations for future engagements.

opportunities.title: Enhance Initial Communication and Responsiveness
opportunities.description: There was a misalignment in communication style and responsiveness at the outset, which needs improvement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are a time sensitive organization...we're hearing back within two three hours.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Set clear SLAs and preferred communication channels at the start of each project to ensure alignment.

opportunities.title: Maintain Candidate Pipeline Until Hire Confirmation
opportunities.description: Andre was concerned about the lack of backup candidates if the finalist did not work out.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I was not quite comfortable that we had a ready backup pool we'd be able to immediately bring in and continue the process...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure a continuous flow of candidates until the hire is fully confirmed to avoid over-reliance on a single finalist.

opportunities.title: Proactive Assessment Result Notifications
opportunities.description: There was a delay in assessment rollout due to lack of proactive communication about result availability.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There hadn't been a communication from the team beyond sending it to a dedicated mailbox...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a standard process for proactive notifications when assessment results are sent to clients.

opportunities.title: Need for Association-Specific Expertise
opportunities.description: The client expressed a need for consultants who understand the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant struggled to fully grasp the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Deploy consultants with experience in member-driven governance models for future association-related searches.

opportunities.title: Deepen Understanding of Client Governance
opportunities.description: Improving understanding and adherence to client-specific governance structures could enhance trust and deepen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant sometimes went directly to the Board Chair, overriding the recruitment policy.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure all team members are briefed on and adhere to the client's governance structures and decision-making processes.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust Through Improved Responsiveness
opportunities.description: The client noted a need for more prompt action on feedback to rebuild trust and confidence in the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Feedback sometimes required repeating before being actioned.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a system to ensure client feedback is promptly addressed and communicated back to the client.

opportunities.title: Align Candidate Pool with Client Criteria
opportunities.description: There was a mismatch between the candidates presented and the client's criteria, affecting confidence in the service.
opportunities.supportingQuote: External candidates were put forward despite clear feedback they were not appropriate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Tailor candidate searches to align closely with the client's specified criteria and feedback.

opportunities.title: Strategic Focus Over Volume in Candidate Search
opportunities.description: The client preferred a small pool of high-quality candidates rather than a broad outreach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It felt more like he was trying to get us bodies...we told them, hey, listen, we need two or three people.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Focus on quality over quantity by narrowing the candidate pool to meet the client's specific needs.

opportunities.title: Compensation Alignment with Client Expectations
opportunities.description: Candidates presented were outside the client's disclosed compensation range, leading to misalignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He brought us someone who... was well over a million dollars in salary, and he knew ours was like at 600, 700,000 total.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure candidate compensation expectations align with the client's disclosed range before presentation.

opportunities.title: Clarify Assessment Approach Early
opportunities.description: Michael emphasized the need for a proactive discussion about assessment processes to avoid overlap with Cargill's intensive process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My only recommendation is make sure you have a very clear conversation with your client about your assessment, whether they have one, and whether it makes sense to do both. Yeah, upfront.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate early discussions with clients to align on assessment processes and avoid duplication.

opportunities.title: Deepen Thought Partnership
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's expert guidance was appreciated, suggesting an opportunity to further position themselves as strategic advisors.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were [a] really good thought partner on process, like who the candidate should interview with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to offer bold, expert advice and explore additional areas where Korn Ferry can provide strategic insights.

opportunities.title: Maintain Pipeline Confidence
opportunities.description: There was concern about having limited options for stakeholders, which was resolved by introducing a strong candidate late in the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was some stress at one point that, like, man, are we putting all our eggs in one basket... at the 11th hour, Korn Ferry pulled a rabbit out of their hat with the candidate that ultimately got this job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure a robust candidate pipeline is maintained throughout the search process to provide stakeholders with confidence in their options.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Pipeline Visibility
opportunities.description: Michael noted a need for broader candidate pipelines to avoid reliance on a single finalist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: At one stage the search felt too dependent on a single finalist, creating concern about having options for stakeholders.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop strategies to ensure a diverse and visible candidate pipeline is presented to clients throughout the search process.

opportunities.title: Need for Quicker Interim Updates
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina expressed a desire for quicker interim updates to reassure stakeholders and provide early feedback on candidate profiles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It would have been better to just get...the first profile to work with...and tell them [yes] that's going in the right direction.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a process to share initial candidate profiles earlier in the search process to gather feedback and maintain stakeholder engagement.

opportunities.title: Enhance Flexibility in Processes
opportunities.description: The structured methodology of Korn Ferry was perceived as less flexible compared to boutique firms, leading to a slower process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: With Korn Ferry, I sometimes [had] the impression they really need[ed] to follow their standard procedure...sometimes I would have liked them to be a bit more...flexible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce more adaptable processes that allow for quicker adjustments based on client feedback and project needs.

opportunities.title: Address Initial Perception of Disengagement
opportunities.description: The CFO initially felt that Korn Ferry was disengaged, which could impact future engagements if not addressed.
opportunities.supportingQuote: In the very beginning [the CFO] really had the impression they [Korn Ferry] didn't want to do the job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively engage with key stakeholders at the start of a project to clarify commitment and address any concerns about engagement levels.

opportunities.title: Improve Response Times
opportunities.description: Emails sometimes went unanswered for extended periods, which affected client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes it took 30 hours or so but you have an email to three [people] so you would have thought at least one of them could just tell me, look, we are going to answer maybe tomorrow.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear response time expectations and ensure timely communication to enhance client experience.

opportunities.title: Adopt Modern Data Handling Practices
opportunities.description: The client preferred secure data sharing methods over email, which was seen as outdated.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I didn't want to have any profiles in my inbox...[I'd rather you] share your drive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Utilize secure, client-preferred data sharing methods such as shared drives to align with best practices.

opportunities.title: Advisory on AI Impact on Workforce
opportunities.description: Stephen expressed interest in understanding AI's impact on workforce development and compensation structures, indicating a potential need for advisory services in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: AI awareness is something always on my mind… it’s confusing, but it’s changing how younger generations develop within the workforce.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate discussions with Stephen about AI's impact on talent and compensation strategies to explore potential advisory services.

opportunities.title: Broader Engagement as DLH Grows
opportunities.description: Stephen is open to using Korn Ferry more broadly as DLH Holdings expands, suggesting potential for increased engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would consider using them more broadly as DLH Holdings grows.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular communication with Stephen to identify opportunities for expanded services as DLH Holdings grows.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Partnership Through Quality Assurance
opportunities.description: Occasional errors in presentation materials have slightly undermined confidence, indicating a need to reinforce quality assurance processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I always trust their work. But...there are times where I have found mistakes...which I'm kind of surprised about.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement additional quality control checks on deliverables to ensure accuracy and maintain client confidence.

opportunities.title: Enhance Quality Control in Deliverables
opportunities.description: Stephen noted occasional calculation errors in presentations, suggesting a need for improved quality control to maintain trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Occasional errors in materials provided. 'I always trust their work. But...there are times where I have found mistakes...'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Strengthen internal quality control processes to prevent errors in client deliverables.

opportunities.title: Post-Placement Follow-Up
opportunities.description: Vanessa expressed interest in receiving feedback on the placed candidate's performance after a few weeks and months.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I really hope that they will do a follow up with [our placement]...when she's [been] here for a few weeks and then maybe within three or six months....Give her a call and really ask like how is it going and then give me the feedback because that's really valuable for me
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured post-placement follow-up process to gather feedback from both the client and the candidate.

opportunities.title: Timely Report Delivery
opportunities.description: Ensure candidate reports are delivered with sufficient lead time before interviews to allow adequate preparation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They sent the first candidate report...48 hours before the interview...I told them that this was too short
opportunities.suggestedAction: Standardize report delivery timelines to ensure clients receive them well in advance of interviews.

opportunities.title: Consistency in Report Content
opportunities.description: Ensure all candidate reports contain the necessary details required for interviews to avoid omissions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was also some information missing... but they were very reactive and adapted it for the next reports.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a checklist for report content to ensure consistency and completeness across all candidate reports.

opportunities.title: Extend Candidate Lifecycle Engagement
opportunities.description: Introduce consistent post-placement follow-up to reinforce relationship depth and demonstrate ongoing partnership value.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I really hope that they will do a follow up with [our placement]...when she's [been] here for a few weeks and then maybe within three or six months....Give her a call and really ask like how is it going and then give me the feedback because that's really valuable for me
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a post-placement engagement strategy to maintain and deepen client relationships.

opportunities.title: Broader Expertise and Data Utilization
opportunities.description: Lisa expressed interest in using Korn Ferry's broader expertise and data for various needs, indicating potential future requirements for additional resources or services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm like I actually need something in this area, have you got something that would help, while it's not everyday...there's been a sharing of all the resources that are available to us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively offer insights and resources from Korn Ferry's broader expertise to address potential future needs.

opportunities.title: Deepen Partnership Through Cultural Alignment
opportunities.description: Lisa appreciates the cultural alignment and partnership with Korn Ferry, suggesting an opportunity to deepen the relationship by leveraging this alignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've really enjoyed that kind of partnership, and that it felt very natural...what I appreciate about Korn Ferry is there's no such thing as one size fits all.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to emphasize cultural alignment and tailor services to further strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Enhance Listening and Coordination
opportunities.description: Lisa noted the need for improved listening and coordination, particularly in multi-region engagements, indicating a need to re-engage and strengthen these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There's probably a little bit more listening needed on the US side than the European side...an opportunity to work on communication when there are multiple teams around the table.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement training and processes to enhance listening skills and coordination across teams, especially in multi-region projects.

opportunities.title: Streamline Scheduling Processes
opportunities.description: Minor scheduling issues were noted, suggesting a need to improve the scheduling process to avoid last-minute conflicts.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I know there's been some [difficulty] trying to get meetings in the diary with CFF, or interviews in the diary with the CFF last minute, which is never going to work for her.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear scheduling protocols and advance planning to prevent last-minute scheduling conflicts.

opportunities.title: Ensure Consistency Across Teams
opportunities.description: The quality of delivery has varied when different consultants lead searches, affecting client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I wasn't as impressed...we had a talent search...the person that was on it was fine but then he ended up leaving so wasn't as engaged...Jerry took over and we were able to move the process along pretty quickly...it depends on the team that you're working with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement standardized processes and training to ensure consistent quality across all consultant teams.

opportunities.title: Provide Market Insights and Benchmarking
opportunities.description: Cana expressed interest in receiving periodic benchmarking or compensation insights to aid in decision-making.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If we could get more comp benchmarking surveys. I know that when we used to work... with Heidrick & Struggles, they would send us an annual comp report which was helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer periodic market insights and compensation benchmarking reports to clients.

opportunities.title: Support in Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Initiatives
opportunities.description: Macquarie is focusing on increasing diverse representation in senior hiring, which may require specialized support.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: increasing diverse representation in senior hiring.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer tailored services and expertise to support Macquarie's DE&I initiatives in senior hiring.

opportunities.title: Assist in Digital and AI Integration
opportunities.description: Macquarie is expanding its technological capability and data-led decision-making, indicating a need for expertise in digital and AI integration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Digital and AI integration: expanding technological capability and data-led decision-making across the business.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to provide consulting services in digital transformation and AI integration.

opportunities.title: Talent Development for New Growth Areas
opportunities.description: Macquarie is focusing on talent development for private equity adjacencies and entrepreneurial fund structures.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Talent development for new growth areas: including private equity adjacencies and entrepreneurial fund structures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer strategic guidance and talent development programs tailored to Macquarie's new growth areas.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Assessment Services
opportunities.description: Mike noted that the assessment outputs were less insightful and not fully aligned with expectations, indicating a need for more tailored and actionable assessment services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It took a long time and the insights were lacking...I [asked] specifically [for] data on peers, data on up...[but they] didn't do what was instructed.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review and enhance the assessment services to provide more tailored and actionable insights that align with client expectations.

opportunities.title: Deepen Strategic Partnership
opportunities.description: Mike appreciated the consultative and strategic partnership with Dan, suggesting potential to expand this approach across other engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Dan really guided the strategy of the search as well, not just execution of it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Leverage Dan's strategic approach as a model to expand similar partnerships with other clients.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Consistency Across Teams
opportunities.description: Mike's experience was heavily influenced by Dan's personal approach, indicating a need for consistent delivery across all teams.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I didn't feel like I was working exactly with Korn Ferry... Dan comes with quite creative approaches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Standardize communication and delivery practices to ensure consistency across all client engagements.

opportunities.title: Optimize Search Process and Resourcing
opportunities.description: The search process could be more structured with better resource allocation to improve efficiency and effectiveness.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Early-stage mapping took longer than planned...it felt like Dan had to pull the weight.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance the search process by ensuring adequate resource allocation and structured early-stage mapping.

opportunities.title: Simplify Access to Insights
opportunities.description: KF4D usability was noted as difficult, suggesting a need to simplify access to valuable insights.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It has a treasure trove of valuable information... it's incredibly hard to get out.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Improve the usability of internal systems to make data and insights more accessible for clients.

opportunities.title: Potential for Leadership Development Services
opportunities.description: Briony has previously had a positive experience with Korn Ferry's leadership development services and currently manages this internally due to budget constraints.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Leadership development is delivered in-house at IVC due to budget priorities, though Briony previously had an excellent experience with Korn Ferry’s development offering in a previous role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to offer competitive pricing or bundled services for leadership development to fit within IVC's budget constraints.

opportunities.title: Broaden Executive Search Across Functions
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry is a trusted partner for finance roles, but there is potential to expand their services to other executive roles within IVC.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I use them extensively for finance...but there are other parts of the organization [that] use Korn Ferry for CEO, general management type roles.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with Briony and other stakeholders to identify additional executive roles where Korn Ferry can provide search services.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship with Group CFO
opportunities.description: Rebecca Moreland has a strong relationship with the Group CFO, which is crucial for successful placements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Rebecca's deep familiarity with the CFO's style and expectations supports successful alignment.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to nurture the relationship with the Group CFO through regular check-ins and tailored communication.

opportunities.title: Tailor Data Sharing Methods to Stakeholder Preferences
opportunities.description: Some stakeholders prefer traditional methods of receiving reports and feedback over online portals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some of my leaders...very happily log into a portal...but there are some stakeholders who are used to getting a report sent through on email, feedback on a phone call.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer flexible data sharing options to accommodate different stakeholder preferences, ensuring satisfaction across the board.

opportunities.title: Need for Formal Communication Structure
opportunities.description: There is a need to establish a formal communication process among stakeholders to enhance efficiency and clarity.
opportunities.supportingQuote: we didn't really talk about a formal communication process...they didn't necessarily have a point person...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a formal communication structure with designated points of contact for future projects.

opportunities.title: Inclusion of Quantitative Metrics in Candidate Profiles
opportunities.description: Adding business scale and performance data, such as market cap and TSR, to candidate profiles would provide more comprehensive insights.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Perhaps seeing some TSR during the 10 years for the CEO candidates and CFF candidates, particularly where it's more easily measurable...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Integrate relevant quantitative metrics into candidate profiles to enhance decision-making.

opportunities.title: Leverage Success for Broader Engagement
opportunities.description: Success in board recruitment has led to further work on CEO succession, indicating potential for expanding the relationship scope.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Success with board recruitment led to further work on CEO succession...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional areas of collaboration beyond board recruitment and CEO succession.

opportunities.title: Ensure Continuity Beyond Key Personnel
opportunities.description: Reliance on Jane's personal network and expertise highlights the need for continuity planning to maintain service quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Reliance on Jane's personal network noted as a potential continuity consideration.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a plan to ensure continuity of service and knowledge transfer within the team.

opportunities.title: Potential Future Hiring Needs
opportunities.description: Although the board is currently stable with no immediate hiring needs, future discussions on governance, structural change, and portfolio matters may lead to new recruitment opportunities.
opportunities.supportingQuote: At present, the board is stable with no immediate hiring needs. Discussions focus on governance, structural change, and ongoing portfolio matters.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular contact with Kristin to stay informed about any changes in governance or structural needs that may lead to future hiring opportunities.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Management Level
opportunities.description: Technology and AI are more active topics at the management level, suggesting potential for expanding Korn Ferry's services beyond the board to management roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Technology and AI are more active topics at management level than at board level.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to engage with Delivery Hero's management team on technology and AI-related recruitment needs.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Consultant Relationships
opportunities.description: Kristin values the trusted relationship with Mette and other consultants, indicating a need to maintain and strengthen these connections.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I trust them and really feel that they're stretching to make me happy and make us satisfied.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure ongoing engagement and communication with Kristin to reinforce trust and satisfaction with Korn Ferry's services.

opportunities.title: Maintain High Delivery Standards
opportunities.description: The successful outcome and positive feedback highlight the importance of continuing the structured, efficient approach in candidate delivery.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've been very happy with it... [they came] up with a very good list of candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to focus on delivering strong, well-qualified candidate pools and maintaining efficient communication throughout the recruitment process.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Market Insights and Benchmarking
opportunities.description: Fiona appreciates the value-added insights and responsiveness Korn Ferry provides, indicating a future need for continued and possibly expanded market insights and benchmarking support.
opportunities.supportingQuote: sometimes we might be asked to find insights on something specific...and they will always go out and come back with information for us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively offer expanded market insights and benchmarking services to anticipate and meet future client needs.

opportunities.title: Deepen Consultant Involvement in HR Searches
opportunities.description: Fiona noted stronger delivery when long-standing consultants familiar with NatWest were involved in HR searches, suggesting an opportunity to deepen consultant involvement in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: we felt that Hilary and Samira got what we were looking for...we gained a better service when [they] were involved.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that consultants with established relationships and understanding of NatWest are involved in HR searches to enhance service delivery.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Continuity Across Teams
opportunities.description: Fiona highlighted the importance of maintaining continuity and consistency across engagements, signaling a need to re-engage and strengthen team continuity.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The value of maintaining involvement of consultants with established relationships to preserve cultural understanding and delivery consistency.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement strategies to ensure continuity and consistency by involving consultants with established client relationships in all relevant projects.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication Consistency
opportunities.description: Despite generally strong communication, there was a single lapse that was quickly resolved, indicating an area for improvement in maintaining communication consistency.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've just had one occasion where I was blindsided. But Hilary picked up the phone straight away and was so hugely apologetic.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review communication protocols to ensure consistent updates and prevent any future lapses, maintaining the 'never blindsided' client experience.

opportunities.title: Future Talent Challenges in Specialist Areas
opportunities.description: Daryl highlighted the need for sourcing specialists in medical, actuarial, and finance functions due to tight market supply.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: Future talent challenges include sourcing specialists in areas such as medical, actuarial, and finance functions, where market supply remains tight.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should develop targeted strategies to address these specialist areas and present them to Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska.

opportunities.title: Consideration for Future Searches
opportunities.description: Daryl confirmed that Korn Ferry would be considered for future searches, depending on level and scope.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: Daryl confirmed that Korn Ferry would 'definitely be in consideration' for future searches, depending on level and scope.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain regular contact with Daryl to stay informed about upcoming search opportunities and offer tailored solutions.

opportunities.title: Maintain Search Momentum in Later Stages
opportunities.description: Daryl noted that search activity appeared to slow once final candidates were identified, suggesting a need to maintain momentum.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: The other thing that I've had to push them on a little bit is now we're down to two or three top candidates... it feels like it slows down considerably once two or three candidates are kind of at the top of the list.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement a strategy to ensure continuous engagement and recruitment efforts until an offer is finalized.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Communication Protocols
opportunities.description: There was an issue with a candidate learning of an outcome from Korn Ferry before internal communication occurred.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: The employee's first understanding that they didn't get the job came from Korn Ferry as opposed to the leader.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should review and clarify communication protocols with clients to ensure proper sequencing of candidate updates.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Confidentiality and Information Handling
opportunities.description: An instance occurred where a senior employee inferred the selected candidate's identity prematurely.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: Brian had a conversation with another one of our employees and somehow during that conversation the employee was able to determine who we selected.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should reinforce internal protocols on confidentiality and information handling to prevent premature disclosure of sensitive information.

opportunities.title: Broaden Awareness of Non-Search Offerings
opportunities.description: Lew has limited awareness of Korn Ferry's consulting and strategy services, indicating a potential need for these services in the future.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Broader awareness of Korn Ferry's non-search offerings (consulting, strategy) remains low.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively introduce and educate Lew about their consulting and strategy services to explore potential future needs.

opportunities.title: Partnership-Based Pricing Model
opportunities.description: Lew suggested that the pricing structure could better reflect the long-term loyalty and frequency of engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think I deserve a lower fee.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider implementing a preferred rate or loyalty pricing structure for repeat clients like Lew to deepen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Increase Visibility of Post-Placement Follow-Up
opportunities.description: Lew is not always aware of formal post-placement follow-up, which could strengthen the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not aware of them following back up with candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance communication around post-placement follow-up activities to reinforce continuity and support long-term client relationships.

opportunities.title: Enhance Client Engagement Through Events
opportunities.description: Lew mentioned waiting for an invitation to a Korn Ferry event, suggesting that such engagements could improve client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lew mentioned he was still waiting for an invite to go Pro AM on the Korn Ferry tour.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Organize and invite Lew to Korn Ferry events to strengthen personal connections and client loyalty.

opportunities.title: Need for Higher-Level Analytical Roles
opportunities.description: Jen mentioned the use of AI and automation in her team, indicating a future need for higher-level roles to analyze and ensure correct conclusions from data.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're using some more intelligent solutions...driving [a need for] higher level people to be able to analyse, actually ensure that it's being done right.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively offer expertise in sourcing and placing candidates for higher-level analytical roles to support Generac's evolving needs.

opportunities.title: Broader Engagement in HR Projects
opportunities.description: Jen values Korn Ferry's expertise beyond recruitment, having engaged them for culture and organizational projects.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We used them last year for our spans and layers exercise, our culture assessment... a few other HR related projects.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore additional HR and organizational development projects with Generac to deepen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Maintain Visibility for Future Senior Director Role
opportunities.description: Generac plans to open a second Senior Director role next year, presenting an opportunity for Korn Ferry to support the hire.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Generac plans to open a second Senior Director role next year; maintain visibility to support that hire.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should stay proactively connected with Generac to ensure they are the preferred partner for the upcoming Senior Director role.

opportunities.title: Improve Consistency Across Teams
opportunities.description: Jen noted variation in experience and delivery style between teams, suggesting a need for a unified client experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Differences in approach between functional teams highlight an opportunity to ensure a unified client experience.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should standardize best practices across teams to provide a consistent and cohesive client experience.

opportunities.title: Early Compensation and Expectation Alignment
opportunities.description: The ESG search faced challenges due to misalignment of compensation and expectations, which could have been addressed earlier.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They probably didn't flag it [compensation misalignment] as much as we realistically needed... it was a mismatch upfront.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should ensure early discussions on compensation and role expectations to align with market realities from the outset.

opportunities.title: Support for Cultural Integration
opportunities.description: Ferrero is facing a cultural integration challenge due to rapid growth through acquisitions. Korn Ferry can assist in unifying employee sentiment across different legacies.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We've doubled the number of employees within the last 10 years. 50% of our employees didn't start their journey in Ferrero, they were acquired by Ferrero.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose a tailored engagement strategy to address cultural integration and unify employee sentiment across acquired entities.

opportunities.title: Deepen Engagement with Employee Lifecycle Measurement
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry is already partnering with Ferrero on the next phase of employee lifecycle measurement, presenting an opportunity to expand their role.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry continues to partner with Ferrero on the next phase of employee lifecycle measurement, reflecting a strong and ongoing relationship.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer additional services and insights that align with Ferrero's evolving people priorities to deepen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Address Communication Style Concerns
opportunities.description: A project manager's risk-focused communication style caused concern within the team, indicating a need to re-engage with a more positive approach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Her style in engaging with us as a team was one that would focus on the risks and the negatives...it kind of struck fear about how this was all going to go wrong.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure all project managers adopt a balanced, reassuring communication style to maintain confidence and trust.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication Tone Consistency
opportunities.description: Variation in communication tone affected feedback reception, suggesting a need for consistent, positive framing in communications.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Differences in delivery style affected how feedback was received; a more positive, reassuring tone was better received by the team.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide training or guidelines to project managers on maintaining a consistent, positive communication tone.

opportunities.title: Enhance Support in Compensation Discussions
opportunities.description: Gerd expected more assertive support from Korn Ferry during compensation negotiations, particularly in challenging candidate expectations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have expected a little bit more of support... I would have appreciated a little bit more of challenging behaviour versus the candidate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clearer guidance and challenge candidate expectations more robustly during compensation discussions.

opportunities.title: Ensure Initial Briefing Clarity
opportunities.description: One stakeholder felt the initial briefing did not fully convey the nuances of the brief, although this was later resolved.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My experience of the actual briefing call was not a good one... I felt they didn't fully grasp what we wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure full alignment on nuanced or non-standard briefs from the outset to avoid early uncertainty.

opportunities.title: Follow-Up on Candidate Onboarding
opportunities.description: There was uncertainty about whether Korn Ferry followed up with the hire after onboarding.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I don't know. I have no idea if they did follow up... there was no need for them to support us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a clear follow-up process post-hire to ensure client satisfaction and address any potential onboarding issues.

opportunities.title: Potential for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Michael indicated that Korn Ferry would be the first point of contact for any future executive searches at the University of Pennsylvania.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Michael noted that they would be the first people contacted for any future searches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular check-ins with Michael to stay informed about upcoming search needs and ensure readiness to assist.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship Through Consultant Familiarity
opportunities.description: Michael appreciated the continuity of team members familiar with the University of Pennsylvania, which strengthened communication and ensured a seamless process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We were really impressed by Sophie...[we asked if] there [was] any way we could think about having her join the team [of the most recent search] because she knows the institution, she knows us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Whenever possible, assign consultants who have previously worked with the University of Pennsylvania to future projects to maintain institutional knowledge and strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Regular Engagement Between Searches
opportunities.description: Maintaining regular engagement between searches can reinforce the trusted relationship and ensure readiness for future needs.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Peter remains Michael’s main point of contact, maintaining regular check-ins between searches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Schedule regular updates and informal check-ins with Michael to keep the relationship active and responsive to any emerging needs.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate-Day Logistics
opportunities.description: The logistics for on-campus candidate visits were described as 'a bit clunky,' indicating a need for clearer coordination.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I just think it could have been a little bit more seamless...there's probably an opportunity in the search process to just sync with them a little bit better.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Clarify roles and responsibilities early in the process to streamline candidate-day logistics and ensure smooth on-site experiences.

opportunities.title: Reassess KF4D Assessment Tool
opportunities.description: The KF4D assessment tool was described as 'underwhelming' and not adding significant value, suggesting a need for reassessment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I wasn't blown away, [and] I don't think our president was blown away by it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Reevaluate the use and delivery of the KF4D assessment to ensure it provides clear, demonstrable value in future searches.

opportunities.title: Need for Enhanced Communication Systems
opportunities.description: Leslie highlighted the need for improved communication systems to prevent scheduling errors and ensure timely updates.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Several coordination lapses affected confidence. One candidate withdrew 15 minutes before an interview, but the client and her team were not informed by Korn Ferry.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a robust communication protocol to ensure timely updates and prevent scheduling errors.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Senior Leadership Engagement
opportunities.description: Leslie expressed openness to discussing feedback with senior leadership to improve future delivery.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They valued Korn Ferry’s openness to feedback and said they would be comfortable discussing these points further with senior leadership.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage senior leadership in ongoing dialogue with Leslie to acknowledge feedback and demonstrate commitment to improvement.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust Through Proactive Client Recovery
opportunities.description: Leslie felt unsupported during key moments due to limited ownership and reassurance, leading to an erosion of trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Limited ownership and reassurance during challenges left Leslie feeling unsupported at key moments.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Train consultants on empathetic responses and proactive reassurance to strengthen client recovery efforts.

opportunities.title: Enhance Quality Assurance and Expertise
opportunities.description: Leslie was underwhelmed by early deliverables and questioned the level of expertise and quality assurance.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I will say [I was a] little disappointed [with] what they put together as the package compared to what I had seen in the past.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Revisit consultant input and deliverable refinement processes to ensure consistent, high-quality delivery.

opportunities.title: Potential Future CEO Searches
opportunities.description: Michael confirmed he would immediately re-engage Jena for any future CEO search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Michael confirmed this is the only service they currently use Korn Ferry for and confirmed he would immediately re-engage Jena for any future CEO search.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular contact with Michael to stay informed about any upcoming leadership needs at OneBlood.

opportunities.title: Expand Services Beyond CEO Searches
opportunities.description: Currently, Korn Ferry is only used for CEO searches at OneBlood, indicating potential to expand services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Michael confirmed this is the only service they currently use Korn Ferry for.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to offer additional services such as leadership development or board advisory to OneBlood.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship with Jena's Leadership
opportunities.description: Jena's leadership and expertise are central to the relationship, and maintaining this connection is crucial.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Jena was viewed as central to the relationship: 'She was the linchpin… when something works for you, you stick with it.'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure Jena continues to lead engagements with OneBlood to reinforce the strong existing relationship.

opportunities.title: Proactive Offer of Broader Expertise
opportunities.description: Matthias appreciated the current service but did not utilize additional assessment options offered by Korn Ferry. This indicates a potential need for more tailored or different services in the future.
opportunities.supportingQuote: While Korn Ferry offered additional assessment options, Matthias chose not to use them, noting that the differences between candidates was already clear.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively discuss and tailor additional services that align with Format's specific needs and decision-making processes.

opportunities.title: Leverage Korn Ferry's Strong Reputation
opportunities.description: The engagement was based on Sasha's personal reputation and Korn Ferry's strong market standing, suggesting an opportunity to deepen the relationship by highlighting other areas of expertise.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The decision was based more on the individual’s reputation than on the organisation, though Korn Ferry is recognised for its strong standing in Switzerland.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should leverage its strong reputation to introduce other services and expertise that could benefit Format's broader organizational goals.

opportunities.title: Maintain High Responsiveness and Accessibility
opportunities.description: Matthias valued the quick responses and accessibility during the final stages of the search, indicating that maintaining this level of engagement is crucial for future interactions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The interaction was fast whenever [there was] news or, when we were in the final phase, fighting for the candidate, [they] returned calls immediately [and were] accessible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should ensure continued high levels of responsiveness and accessibility in all future engagements with Format.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication on Candidate Strengths
opportunities.description: While transparency was appreciated, there is room to enhance how candidate strengths and potential limitations are communicated to ensure client confidence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He even said, 'This is not the strongest, but I want to show you the candidate and you decide.'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should refine its communication strategy to better highlight candidate strengths while maintaining transparency about limitations.

opportunities.title: Potential for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Philippe expressed a clear intention to work with Korn Ferry for future executive searches, indicating a need for ongoing support in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Definitely no brainer... I wouldn't even benchmark.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively reach out to Philippe to discuss upcoming hiring needs and offer continued support for future executive searches.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship Through Market Insights
opportunities.description: Philippe appreciated the market insights and role-shaping discussions provided by Olivier, suggesting an opportunity to expand the relationship by offering more strategic advisory services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It was always an open discussion... finding common grounds.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer regular market insights and strategic advisory sessions to deepen the partnership and provide additional value.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Trust and Professional Alignment
opportunities.description: The strong trust and professional alignment between Philippe and Olivier were key to the successful collaboration, highlighting the importance of maintaining this relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Knowing his level of ethics and professionalism, I was quite confident that we could find common grounds.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Schedule regular check-ins with Philippe to reinforce trust and ensure continued alignment on future projects.

opportunities.title: Interest in Curated Peer Networking
opportunities.description: Keith expressed a desire for Korn Ferry to facilitate smaller, curated peer networking groups, as he finds current industry forums exhausting and lacking value.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If networking became part of that... that would be helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer curated, small-group peer networking opportunities tailored to Keith's industry and interests.

opportunities.title: Expand Engagement Beyond Search Services
opportunities.description: Keith does not currently engage with Korn Ferry's broader services due to limited headspace, but this is not due to dissatisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: When I need something, I go looking... I don't often pick my head up and look around...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively introduce Keith to relevant non-search services that align with his business needs and interests.

opportunities.title: Maintain Human-Led Search Approach
opportunities.description: Keith values the human element in the search process and has expressed a preference against AI-driven approaches.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would hate it if... there's weird AI searches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that Korn Ferry's search processes remain human-led and communicate this commitment clearly to Keith.

opportunities.title: Enhance Use of Assessment Tools in Onboarding
opportunities.description: Keith finds the KF assessment tool helpful and actively uses it for onboarding and managing new hires.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Yes, I use that tool. I find it very helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide additional guidance on leveraging assessment insights to support team integration and early performance.

opportunities.title: Improve Timeliness of Candidate Materials
opportunities.description: Paul highlighted the late delivery of candidate packs as a significant operational issue, impacting meeting efficiency and preparation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They would always send the book out usually in the morning, two hours before the meeting.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure candidate materials are provided the night before meetings to allow adequate preparation time.

opportunities.title: Increase Awareness of Assessment Offerings
opportunities.description: Paul was unaware of Korn Ferry's assessment capabilities, indicating a need to better communicate these services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I didn't know they had an assessment.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Educate clients on the availability and benefits of assessment tools during senior hiring processes.

opportunities.title: Promote Non-Search Services
opportunities.description: Paul expressed a desire for more proactive promotion of Korn Ferry's non-search offerings, such as organization consulting.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They wouldn't register in my head because they've never pushed it...Their practices need a bit more joined up thinking.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively explain and market non-search services to clients to expand service utilization.

opportunities.title: Enhance Internal Coordination Across Practices
opportunities.description: Paul noted a lack of awareness of Korn Ferry's broader services, suggesting a need for a more unified approach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Their practices need a bit more joined up thinking.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Present a more unified cross-practice approach to clients to avoid being perceived as siloed.

opportunities.title: Guidance on AI in Recruitment
opportunities.description: Joanne expressed a need for guidance on the implications of AI tools in recruitment processes, particularly regarding pitfalls and candidate impacts.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Joanne noted the need for guidance on pitfalls and candidate impacts related to AI tools in application processes.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should provide insights and guidance on the use of AI in recruitment, tailored to PMI's context.

opportunities.title: Increase Awareness of Korn Ferry Services
opportunities.description: Joanne is interested in understanding the full range of Korn Ferry's offerings to better handle internal referrals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Better understanding the breadth of what they offer... would be helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should organize a briefing or provide materials that outline their full suite of services to Joanne.

opportunities.title: Facilitate Peer-to-Peer Networking
opportunities.description: Joanne welcomes opportunities for peer networking and knowledge exchange beyond direct guidance from Korn Ferry.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would welcome that... peer-to-peer networking would always be [helpful].
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore setting up peer networking events or forums for leaders involved in governance and nominations.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Candidate Coordination Practices
opportunities.description: There was a minor issue with candidate scheduling due to time zone challenges, which was the only escalation Joanne experienced.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had a candidate who couldn't seem to connect... it was like phone tag and email tag...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should review and reinforce their candidate coordination practices to prevent similar issues in the future.

opportunities.title: Enhance Structured Knowledge-Sharing
opportunities.description: Joanne is interested in newsletters, peer networks, and cross-sector learning, indicating a desire for more structured knowledge-sharing.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Interest in newsletters, peer networks, and cross-sector learning indicates appetite for more structured knowledge-sharing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should consider developing a regular newsletter or knowledge-sharing platform tailored to Joanne's interests and needs.

opportunities.title: Need for Modern Training Formats
opportunities.description: Felix expressed a desire for more modern and interactive training materials, such as e-learning or multimedia formats.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would wish to have something like more interactive... a nice movie and e-learning would also be helpful... could be a bit more modern.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer modern, interactive training formats to enhance user engagement and learning.

opportunities.title: Enhance Market Data Configurability
opportunities.description: Felix noted a significant gap in the ability to filter market data by bonus-paying versus non-bonus-paying companies for accurate benchmarking.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I miss... very specific aspects... I cannot say I don't want to see only companies who pay a bonus... sometimes I'm not happy with this kind of data submission.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce clearer filters in the market data to differentiate between bonus-paying and non-bonus-paying companies.

opportunities.title: Offer Practical, Affordable Grading Tool
opportunities.description: Felix had to create their own grading tool due to dissatisfaction with available options, indicating a need for a practical and cost-effective solution.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've also created a grading tool by ourselves, because they don't provide one which is very useful or not too expensive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore developing a practical and affordable grading tool to meet client needs.

opportunities.title: Address Functional vs Hierarchical Leadership
opportunities.description: Felix found it challenging to benchmark roles with functional versus hierarchical leadership within the current methodology.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Many people have functional leadership roles in comparison with hierarchical... can be difficult.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide guidance or examples on handling functional versus hierarchical leadership roles within the methodology.

opportunities.title: Maintain Strong Responsiveness and Trust
opportunities.description: Felix appreciated the strong rapport and responsiveness of the Korn Ferry team, which was a key positive aspect of the engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: With the colleagues of the team... I get very well... they are very responsive, and I don't have feelings that... you cannot trust them.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to prioritize responsiveness and relationship-building to maintain client trust and satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Onboarding Support for New CEO
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry has promised to support the onboarding of the new CEO, but this phase has not yet begun.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They have promised us that they will be there... but it hasn't really begun yet.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate the onboarding support process promptly to fulfill the commitment made to the client.

opportunities.title: Single Point of Contact for Communication
opportunities.description: Early confusion arose due to multiple points of contact from Korn Ferry, making it difficult for the search committee to track information.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a single, consistent communication point from the start of the project to streamline information flow and reduce confusion.

opportunities.title: Deepen Partnership with Tailored Services
opportunities.description: The client appreciated Korn Ferry's tailored approach and strong understanding of their needs, which sets the stage for expanding the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had a better understanding of what we were looking for... tailored the search to what we really wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to offer customized services and explore additional areas where Korn Ferry's expertise can benefit the museum.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Gender-Diverse Sourcing
opportunities.description: Jeanette expressed a need for more gender-diverse candidate slates in future searches, as current efforts required repeated reminders.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement transparent, proactive processes to ensure balanced slates and review team composition to enhance diverse sourcing perspectives.

opportunities.title: Improved Compensation Discovery Process
opportunities.description: The current compensation discovery process was slow and lacked detail, impacting offer decisions and candidate retention.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Gather full, detailed compensation information early in the process to reduce back-and-forth with candidates and prevent delays at the offer stage.

opportunities.title: Assertive Leadership in Client Interactions
opportunities.description: Jeanette felt the consultants lacked assertiveness and leadership, requiring her to drive the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We ended up running the calls.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively highlight recommended candidates, lead discussions confidently, and guide decision-making to take ownership of meeting facilitation.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Reports and Materials
opportunities.description: Reports were often shared too late for adequate preparation, affecting the efficiency of the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The reports would often land an hour or two before the call... you have no hope in hell of getting to it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Share reports and candidate materials with sufficient lead time for stakeholders to review and maintain momentum from the outset.

opportunities.title: Proactive Brief Refinement
opportunities.description: There was a lack of proactive correction when the brief remained misaligned, affecting the search's effectiveness.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They just weren't hitting the right brief.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Raise any concerns about candidate fit, search direction, or brief interpretation proactively to prevent misalignment from persisting.

opportunities.title: Support in Succession Planning
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen expressed a need for Korn Ferry to assist with improving succession planning and reducing blind spots in their current processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we need to have someone that is doing some of these... evaluations and analysis to make sure that we don't have blind spots.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should propose a detailed plan for enhancing TriSummit's succession planning processes.

opportunities.title: Broader Board-Level Support
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the relationship by offering more rigorous board-level support and coaching.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg sees clear scope for more rigorous succession assessment and board-level support, and is already exploring this with Korn Ferry.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should engage with Greg to outline potential board-level services that could be beneficial to TriSummit.

opportunities.title: Re-engage for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen expressed a strong intent to reuse Korn Ferry for future executive searches, indicating a need to maintain engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Would I ever use these people again? I can't imagine not using them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule regular check-ins with Greg to stay informed about upcoming executive search needs.

opportunities.title: Increase Visibility in the Market
opportunities.description: Greg suggested that Korn Ferry could strengthen its visibility, which could enhance their market presence and client acquisition.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He struggled to identify any issues with the work itself, suggesting only that Korn Ferry could potentially strengthen its visibility.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should develop a marketing strategy to enhance its visibility in the utility sector.

opportunities.title: Need for concise assessment summaries
opportunities.description: The CEO expressed a desire for more concise and clearly framed assessment summaries, particularly on specific behavioral aspects such as handling conflict and restructuring.
opportunities.supportingQuote: You might sometimes maybe have wished them to be a little bit more black and white... on the very concrete things, how things will work.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a format for executive summaries that highlights key behavioral flags in a concise manner.

opportunities.title: Leverage strong individual relationships
opportunities.description: The CEO's trust in specific individuals at Korn Ferry was a decisive factor in choosing the firm, indicating potential for deepening the relationship through these connections.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I knew the boss, I knew the consultant that I wanted to work with, because I have a deep trust in [Danny]'s... human touch.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to nurture and leverage strong individual relationships to expand engagement with the client.

opportunities.title: Maintain pace and transparency
opportunities.description: The CEO valued the fast candidate generation and efficient interview process, suggesting that maintaining this level of service is crucial for ongoing satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Everything went very fast, the finding of the candidates in both role. I also was impressed that it was fast...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that future engagements maintain the same level of speed and transparency in candidate sourcing and communication.

opportunities.title: Improve practical client experience
opportunities.description: The CEO mentioned a minor irritation with parking logistics at Korn Ferry's office, indicating room for improvement in the practical aspects of client visits.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd wish they had parking spaces in their own office, because you always have to go to another building... it's a bit annoying.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore options to improve parking arrangements or provide clear guidance to enhance the client visit experience.

opportunities.title: Reintroduce Dual-Consultant Model
opportunities.description: The dual-consultant model, particularly with consultants from different cultural backgrounds, was a unique differentiator and added value to the service.
opportunities.supportingQuote: That was the differentiating factor... two different individuals from two different cultures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore the feasibility of reintroducing the dual-consultant model selectively in high-value markets or key accounts.

opportunities.title: Clarify Value of Assessment Tools
opportunities.description: Assessment tools were provided but not used, as they did not support the client's decision-making process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got that for free in some instances, but honestly, I didn't use it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clearer guidance on when and how assessment tools can meaningfully inform decisions in the hiring process.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Consultation Quality
opportunities.description: The removal of the second consultant reduced the richness of consultation quality, affecting the perceived value.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got different quality of the consultations because obviously the second person was adding a certain perspective and value.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider ways to enhance consultation quality, possibly by integrating diverse perspectives even in a single-consultant model.

opportunities.title: Separate Positioning for Broader Consulting Services
opportunities.description: Jan does not assume Korn Ferry's search capabilities translate to transformation or development work, indicating a need for distinct positioning.
opportunities.supportingQuote: No, because that's a different skill set... I would again pitch and see who's best.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure broader consulting services are introduced by the right experts and positioned separately from search capabilities.

opportunities.title: Broader Candidate Sourcing for High-Profile Roles
opportunities.description: Gary expressed a need for Korn Ferry to explore a wider range of potential candidates, including those from non-traditional sectors, for high-profile roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I had urged them to look broad... like college presidents... and they didn't really do that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should expand their candidate sourcing strategy to include diverse and non-traditional backgrounds for high-profile roles.

opportunities.title: Early Validation of Candidate Commitment
opportunities.description: There is a need for Korn Ferry to confirm practical considerations such as relocation readiness earlier in the process to avoid late-stage withdrawals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry should have vetted this ahead of time... before we went through this final testing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a more rigorous early-stage validation process for candidate commitment to prevent late-stage disruptions.

opportunities.title: Maintain Continuity and Ownership Throughout Engagement
opportunities.description: Gary noted a drop in perceived priority and ownership following the temporary absence of the lead partner, affecting the engagement's momentum.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It just felt a little bit... an ownership thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure consistent leadership and clear client touchpoints throughout the engagement to maintain momentum and client confidence.

opportunities.title: Explore Adjacent Leadership Capabilities
